# Annual Inspection of Fire Alarm, Fire Protection, and Life Safety Systems for RCMP Buildings in Manitoba
## Contract Details
Launch Date: 2022-11-14
Closing Date: 2022-12-21T15:00:00
Contracting Entity: Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
Contracting Entity Address: 73 Leikin Dr, Ottawa, ON, Canada, K1A 0R2

## Contract Description
### Scope of Work
The RCMP requires an experienced Fire Alarm and Fire Protection System service contractor to complete annual inspections and preventative maintenance on the Fire Alarm and Fire Protection Systems in RCMP buildings across Manitoba.

### Mandatory Security Requirements
The contractor must comply with all security requirements as outlined in the solicitation documents.

### Evaluation Criteria
Bids must meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

## Documents and Attachments
Tender documents and attachments are available for download on the Government Electronic Tendering Service platform.

## Notice and Notifications
Notices of Proposed Procurement (NPP), bid solicitations, and related documents are available for download on the Canadian government's tender opportunities platform.

## Right to Negotiate
The RCMP reserves the right to negotiate directly with any qualified bidder.

## Language of Services
Canada retains the right to specify either official language for services to be provided.

## Integrity Regime
The RCMP's tendering activities are subject to the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.
